data.title: The Adam Stansfield Foundation
data.meta_description: Fundraise or donate to The Adam Stansfield Foundation with JustGiving, the worlds leading online fundraising platform, helping charities to make more with GiftAid
data.text:
About The Adam Stansfield Foundation

We aim to promote community participation in healthy recreation, for the benefit of children and young people up to the age of 16 residing in Devon, Herefordshire and Somerset by the provision of grants and facilities for playing football while also raising awareness of bowel cancer.

www.adamstansfieldfoundation.com

enquiries@adamstansfieldfoundation.com

The Adam Stansfield Foundation Registered charity number 1140579

Donation message

"Thank you so much for helping me with my sports glasses so I can continue to play football. I have been doing lots of chores for pocket money and wanted to donate back. "

Charlie donated

£20.00 + £5.00 Gift Aid
